name: holographic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
related to images in which objects look as if they are solid and real, not flat : a holographic picture/image/projection The holographic design on the front of a bank card is a security feature. See
holography
More examplesFewer examplesThe image was a computer-generated holographic projection.Holographic images are a result of the brain's ability to merge separate signals into one.The best way to store large amounts of data in the future may be holographic storage.
